title: Lost a ranked flex game that demoted me due to server connection problems from Riot's end

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I would like to request the reversion to my flex rank to it's state before this game, and for my teammates IP to be given back to them for this game. I experienced a type of movement delay lag from the server.

 It started at red buff, after it died the model was still there and when I walked to the raptor camp the models did not appear, when I started using abilities and shift click, my health was going down and I was clearing, though the models did not appear and it seems as if there was a delay with my Q. 

My end of the internet was completely fine, I reconnected my router, reconnected my pc to the internet, and both before and after I had normal connection to all websites. When I checked the Riot server status and Riot websites there were extreme delays in connections., though not on any other website. And when attempting to reconnect, the Client said something about having a problem with connecting to the login authentication.

Edit: I'd like to add this, https://gyazo.com/428aa0cadbf6cad95af536201cea7b1c it has been loading like this since the delays, every other website is fine, except for Riot ones.

replies.body: We aren't able to alter game stats or points, though I do appreciate you looking out for your teammates.  It sounds like you had a connection issue like packet loss that caused a delay between the game server and yourself.  Even with a completely fine internet, you can have an unstable connection or routing to our game servers.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview to know for sure.  It will also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your case.  Let me know the results!

Here you go. These are the results of the log reader. In order from earliest to latest during the issue.

https://gyazo.com/b609fe02a0240dca3c962e81996d5503

https://gyazo.com/63e59fc2c4f7114998b0d146bd567a51

https://gyazo.com/a49816bc9757fba9afce19df662ab7ee

Damn, it looks like there's some pretty consistent packet loss happening.  This is likely caused by some unstable connection or setting, or possible how your ISP is reaching us.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and rule out possibilities.  Hopefully that will get it fixed up, but test it in a custom game to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!
